question: Tùi 2015 nî 12 goe̍h 31 ji̍t, 'Advanced' ia̍h-sī 'Standardized' chit ê kùi-tō tōa-lí hong-sek, ūi-tio̍h chòe koân ê 'Total Capital' kiàⁿ-lio̍k, koh-chāi kiâⁿ pah-bān-tōa-la̍h uî tôa-chē?
Tī siâu-téng ê sì ê lia̍t-ba̍k lāi-bīn, 'Tier 1 Capital' ê pêng-kin siáⁿ-choē pah-bān bí-kim?
Chiu chhut khòaⁿ-m̄-chiap ê 'Chóng Lī-hiám Kim-tat Sòe-chu' tùi siáⁿ-chi̍t ê 'Chóng Chu-pún Pí-lē' ê hāng-bo̍k.

Nāi-kó͘-chiap nn̄g ê chu̍t-lāi pâi-choāi sī chiân-chi̍t-tang ê chu̍t-lāi, cháiⁿ chhián-soeh 'Standardized Approach' chi-hā, 'Common Equity Tier 1 Capital Ratio' ê chi̍t-tang-chi̍t-tang ê kái-piàn chhiúⁿ-chāi.
answer: Chha-put-toā, tī 'Standardized Approach' ê koan-hē chi̍a, 'Common Equity Tier 1 Capital Ratio' sī ū chin-hó ê kái-piàn, tùi chiân chi̍t-tang ê 11.12% kòe kàu 2015 nî 12 goe̍h 31 ji̍t ê 12.63%, cheng-ka liáu 1.51 pâi-choāi tiám.

question: Tī '12 ge̍h 31, 2015 nî Thong-chū-lâng hong-hoat' ē-bīn, ū hō-chūi ê sîu-gia̍h-lâi sī khah-kē 15% ê?
Tong 'December 31, 2015 Advanced Approaches' ê chong-ài (Total Capital), ūi-hô-sò͘ 'Tier 2 Capital' ê hūn-chè-chè? (Chù-ì: Tier 2 Capital = Total Capital - Tier 1 Capital)

Tng-lián-sī '12 goe̍h 31, 2015 nî 'piau-chún-hōe hong-hoat' ē-kha, nā-sī 'siong-chu-sòe sū-chāi-seng châi-sán' sī 10% koân--ê, chiū-sī sin ê 'chū-kim 1 chū-kim lē' ē-sī che-nōa, chāi 'chū-kim 1 chū-kim' bô-piàn ê chêng-hêng ē?
Ū-tī 'Total Risk-Weighted Assets' kah piáⁿ-á lāi-bīn ê chiong-chóng tāi-chì-sò͘ ê koan-hē, ē-tàng chhin-chhin cháiⁿ khoàⁿ? Iōng chu-liāu lâi chèng-bêng lí ê kiat-lūn.
answer: It ê 'Total Risk-Weighted Assets' kah chiong-chóng tāi-chì-sò͘ chi-kan ū chi̍t ê tò-chián-sò͘ chha-pia̍h. Sî-chūn ê chha-pia̍h (tāi-chì-sò͘ ê bōe-āu-á) cheng-ka, tāi-chì-sò͘ chiū kàng. Chhiūⁿ-chāi, siōng-kē ê chu-liāu ($1,292,605 pah-bān) ê khò͘, tō ū siōng-kàng ê 'Total Capital Ratio' (12.80), tān-sī siōng-kàng ê chu-liāu ($1,162,884 pah-bān) ê khò͘, tō ū siōng-koân ê 'Total Capital Ratio' (17.08).

question: 2015 nî 12 goe̍h 31 ji̍t ê kim-liông Metrics, kiáⁿ chhut 'Advanced' kap 'Standardized' hong-hoat chi kan ū chin tōa ê khu-pia̍t, in-ūi i ê chú-iàu sêng-hūn lóng sio̍k-tāi？
answer: Chong-sò͘ kap Lêng-chè chi kan ū chin tōa ê khu-pia̍t. 2015 nî ê sî, nn̄g hong-hoat ê Siú-sian Kim-chiuⁿ Lêng-chè kap Lêng-chè lóng sio̍k-tāi. Tān-sī, Chong-sò͘ kap Lêng-chè chi kan ū chhiau-kòe 12 eh Bí-kim ê khu-pia̍t (186,097 bān Bí-kim vs 198,655 bān Bí-kim), chiah kiáⁿ-chhut siòng-tōa ê khu-pia̍t sī Lêng-chè 2 ê Lêng-chè ê siáⁿ-soán.

question: Sui-jiok nn̄g-ê kio̍h bô sio-khiâ ê siāu-tit ê miâ-chheng, chiah-ê chîⁿ ê lūi-sò͘ (tan-ūi: pah-bān-ê lê-bīn) sī cháiⁿ-iūⁿ ê, tī múi-chi̍t ê sî-kî lóng sī 'Advanced' kap 'Standardized' nn̄g ê hong-sek siâⁿ-chòe siâⁿ-chòe sio-kâng ê tiāu-chhí?
Nāi thun kiâⁿ-phiah ê choân-pō͘ lûi-hû-chiâⁿ-tiāu sêng-pún nā chhāi-tī chū-chhú chē-chē, chiâⁿ-bē-chiâⁿ chū-chhú chē-chē ê choân-pō͘ lûi-hû-chiâⁿ-tiāu sêng-pún tō ē tiâu-e̍h?
answer: Choân-pō͘ lûi-hû-chiâⁿ-tiāu sêng-pún ē tiâu-e̍h in-ūi lûi-hû-chiâⁿ-tiāu sêng-pún cheng-ka, chiâⁿ-bē-chiâⁿ ê sêng-pún ē kiám-té chū-chhú chē-chē ê lûi-hû-chiâⁿ-tiāu sêng-pún.
